title: Riot, a few questions about Wolfy and Lambsies being delayed
body:
1) Will their delayment (New word) mean the next champion will also be delayed?

2) Will they be 7800 IP on release or 6300? (They were delayed for 1 week+)

3) What was the bug? They're disabled, we can't abuse it.

replies.body:
1. I don't believe Kindred being delayed will affect the timing on the next champion, that'll be determined by when that champion's ready and what other stuff's ready for release around the same time.

2. 7800 as far as I know (the 6300 IP price point applies after a champion's been out for a week, not a week after intended launch).

3. An issue where it was possible for Wolf to despawn after E casts until you died and respawned.
Will some champions be discounted from 6300 IP when Kindred comes out?

1. I don't see why it would

2. Release will be same as normal. 7800 and reduced a week later.

3. Sometimes you'd lose Wolf until you died.

1, yes

2. why r u asking me

3. ever heard of cancerous kit? too cancerous so they had to disable to protect from brain tumor

bonus video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a8c5wmeOL9o
